title: How to Clean Fibre Mats (Coir, Coconut Matting etc.)

steps.headline: Create a small bucket mix of a little salt and cold water.
steps.description: Make sure to dissolve the salt.

steps.headline: Brush the mat well with the salt water mixture.
Dry outdoors in sunshine.
steps.description: Keep as flat as possible; do not hang over anything such as the clothesline or the mat will develop a permanent fold mark.

text: Beat out the dust.  Create a small bucket mix of a little salt and cold water. Make sure to dissolve the salt. Brush the mat well with the salt water mixture.  Dry outdoors in sunshine. Keep as flat as possible; do not hang over anything such as the clothesline or the mat will develop a permanent fold mark.
